string-array.name: epds_questions_and_responses_array
string-array.item: { \"question\": \"1. I have been able to laugh and see the funny side of things\", \"response0\": \"As much as I always could\", \"response1\": \"Not quite so much now\", \"response2\": \"Definitely not so much now\", \"response3\": \"Not at all\" }

{ \"question\": \"2. I have looked forward with enjoyment to things\", \"response0\": \"As much as I ever did\", \"response1\": \"Rather less than I used to\", \"response2\": \"Definitely less than I used to\", \"response3\": \"Hardly at all\" }

{ \"question\": \"3. I have blamed myself unnecessarily when things went wrong\", \"response0\": \"Yes, most of the time\", \"response1\": \"Yes, some of the time\", \"response2\": \"Not very often\", \"response3\": \"No, never\" }

{ \"question\": \"4. I have been anxious or worried for no good reason\", \"response0\": \"No, not at all\", \"response1\": \"Hardly ever\", \"response2\": \"Yes, sometimes\", \"response3\": \"Yes, very often\" }

{ \"question\": \"5. I have felt scared or panicky for no very good reason\", \"response0\": \"Yes, quite a lot\", \"response1\": \"Yes, sometimes\", \"response2\": \"No, not much\", \"response3\": \"No, not at all\" }

{ \"question\": \"6. Things have been getting on top of me\", \"response0\": \"Yes, most of the time I haven\'t been able to cope at all\", \"response1\": \"Yes, sometimes I haven\'t been coping as well as usual\", \"response2\": \"No, most of the time I have coped quite well\", \"response3\": \"No, I have been coping as well as ever\" }

{ \"question\": \"7. I have been so unhappy that I have had difficulty sleeping\", \"response0\": \"Yes, most of the time\", \"response1\": \"Yes, sometimes\", \"response2\": \"Not very often\", \"response3\": \"No, not at all\" }

{ \"question\": \"8. I have felt sad or miserable\", \"response0\": \"Yes, most of the time\", \"response1\": \"Yes, quite often\", \"response2\": \"Not very often\", \"response3\": \"No, not at all\" }

{ \"question\": \"9. I have been so unhappy that I have been crying\", \"response0\": \"Yes, most of the time\", \"response1\": \"Yes, quite often\", \"response2\": \"Only occasionally\", \"response3\": \"No, never\" }
{ \"question\": \"10. The thought of harming myself has occurred to me\", \"response0\": \"Yes, quite often\", \"response1\": \"Sometimes\", \"response2\": \"Hardly ever\", \"response3\": \"Never\" }
